import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../../Assets/Styles/Filter.css' function Filter({ submitFilterBtn }) { const [location, setLocation] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [price, setPrice] = useState(''); const [propType, setPropType] = useState(''); function handleFilterSubmit(e) { if(location === '' && date === '' && price==='' && propType===''){ alert('Please Select All fields') } else { submitFilterBtn(e, { location, date, price, propType }); } } return ( <>
handleFilterSubmit(e)}>
setDate(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Filter
